definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Newton's law of motion forms the foundation of classical mechanics .
sentences.chinese: 牛頓的運動定律構成傳統力學的基礎。

sentences.english: Newton put forward three laws of motion in the book.
sentences.chinese: 在書中，牛頓提出三個運動定律。

sentences.english: I think Newton's third law of motion was the most relevant.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲牛頓第三運動定律是最有價值的。

sentences.english: The laws of motions will be discussed.
